## Next Steps Checklist

### Immediate (today)
- [ ] Open this file and fill in every `[TODO]` item
- [ ] Add your real URL, price, and name where placeholders appear
- [ ] Choose a landing page tool: [Carrd](https://carrd.co) | [Typedream](https://typedream.com) | [Framer](https://framer.com)

### This week
- [ ] Publish landing page with waitlist form (Kit, Mailchimp, or Typeform)
- [ ] Set up 2-email sequence in your email platform
- [ ] Post on [Indie Hackers](https://www.indiehackers.com) using the copy from Section 2
- [ ] Post on [Reddit r/SideProject](https://www.reddit.com/r/SideProject) using Section 3

### After 10+ signups
- [ ] Activate the Founding Plan section (Section 5) on your landing page
- [ ] Send 1-on-1 outreach to the first 10 signups — schedule a 15-min call
- [ ] Collect qualitative feedback: what language do they use? What pain do they name?

### After 20+ signups and first user conversations
- [ ] Run `planning-interview` in Claude Code to generate your PRD and technical spec
- [ ] Use real user language from conversations to refine this copy
